description: Users must authenticate securely to access the system using their credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can successfully log in with valid credentials and are denied access with invalid credentials.
priority_justification: Critical for ensuring system security and user access control.

description: Different users must have different levels of access based on their roles.
acceptance_criteria: Users are granted access to only the functionalities relevant to their roles.
priority_justification: Essential for maintaining data confidentiality and enforcing compliance.

description: Authorized users should be able to submit healthcare claims electronically.
acceptance_criteria: Claims submitted electronically are successfully received and processed by the system.
priority_justification: Fundamental for initiating the claim adjudication process efficiently.

description: The system must validate submitted claims for accuracy and completeness.
acceptance_criteria: Claims are checked for required fields, format, and adherence to industry standards.
priority_justification: Critical to ensure the integrity of data and compliance with regulations.

description: The system should verify patient eligibility for benefits in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Patient eligibility is confirmed instantly before claim submission.
priority_justification: Important for preventing claim rejections and reducing administrative overhead.

description: Support pre-authorization requirements for certain medical procedures.
acceptance_criteria: System allows for the submission and approval of pre-authorizations before claim submission.
priority_justification: Critical for ensuring coverage for services requiring pre-authorization.

description: Define and apply rules for claim adjudication based on insurance policies.
acceptance_criteria: Claims are processed according to predefined rules, ensuring consistency and accuracy.
priority_justification: Essential for streamlining the claims processing workflow and ensuring compliance.

description: Claims meeting predefined criteria should be automatically processed for payment.
acceptance_criteria: Claims meeting auto-adjudication criteria are processed without manual intervention.
priority_justification: Critical for expediting payment processing and reducing administrative costs.

description: Claims requiring further review should be flagged for manual adjudication by authorized personnel.
acceptance_criteria: Claims flagged for manual adjudication are reviewed and processed by authorized personnel.
priority_justification: Important for handling complex claims and ensuring accurate payment determination.

description: Maintain a history of all claims submitted and their processing status.
acceptance_criteria: System records and tracks the lifecycle of each claim from submission to payment.
priority_justification: Critical for auditability, compliance, and tracking claim processing performance.

description: Provide mechanisms for managing and appealing claim denials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can review, appeal, and track the status of denied claims.
priority_justification: Critical for minimizing revenue loss and ensuring fair reimbursement.

description: Generate and transmit electronic remittance advice to providers.
acceptance_criteria: ERA files are generated accurately and transmitted to providers promptly.
priority_justification: Critical for streamlining payment reconciliation and improving provider relationships.

description: Allow users to inquire about the status of submitted claims.
acceptance_criteria: Users can query the system to obtain real-time updates on claim status.
priority_justification: Important for transparency, customer service, and reducing inquiries.

description: Support coordination of benefits when a patient has multiple insurance coverages.
acceptance_criteria: System identifies and coordinates benefits across multiple insurance plans for the same patient.
priority_justification: Critical for accurate payment determination and avoiding overpayment.

description: Support electronic attachment of documents and additional information to claims.
acceptance_criteria: Users can electronically attach supporting documents to claims for submission.
priority_justification: Critical for providing necessary documentation for claim adjudication.

description: Detect and prevent submission of duplicate claims for the same service.
acceptance_criteria: System identifies and flags duplicate claims to prevent duplicate processing.
priority_justification: Important for preventing overpayment and ensuring data integrity.

description: Allow for the submission and processing of claim adjustments and reversals.
acceptance_criteria: Users can submit adjustments and reversals, and the system processes them accurately.
priority_justification: Critical for correcting errors and updating claim information as needed.

description: Implement mechanisms for detecting potential fraudulent claims.
acceptance_criteria: System analyzes claims data to detect patterns indicative of potential fraud.
priority_justification: Critical for protecting against financial losses and maintaining trust in the system.

description: Maintain an audit trail of all system activities for compliance and accountability purposes.
acceptance_criteria: System logs all user actions, system events, and data modifications for auditing purposes.
priority_justification: Critical for compliance with regulatory requirements and ensuring accountability.

description: Provide comprehensive reporting and analytics capabilities for claims data.
acceptance_criteria: Users can generate standard and custom reports, and perform data analysis.
priority_justification: Critical for monitoring performance, identifying trends, and making informed decisions.

description: Support electronic data interchange (EDI) for seamless data exchange with external entities.
acceptance_criteria: System can send and receive EDI messages compliant with industry standards.
priority_justification: Critical for interoperability and efficient data exchange with external partners.

description: Ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations for patient data privacy and security.
acceptance_criteria: System enforces HIPAA standards for protecting patient information.
priority_justification: Critical for legal compliance and safeguarding sensitive patient data.

description: Validate diagnosis (ICD) and procedure (CPT) codes for accuracy and compliance.
acceptance_criteria: System verifies the accuracy and validity of ICD and CPT codes submitted with claims.
priority_justification: Critical for ensuring accurate billing and compliance with coding standards.

description: Support bundling and unbundling of related claims for processing.
acceptance_criteria: System can group related claims for processing together or separate bundled claims.
priority_justification: Critical for accurately reflecting services provided and preventing underpayment or overpayment.

description: Allow for batch processing of multiple claims simultaneously for efficiency.
acceptance_criteria: System can process a large number of claims in batch mode efficiently.
priority_justification: Critical for handling high volumes of claims and optimizing system performance.

description: Integrate with external systems such as EMRs, clearinghouses, and payer portals.
acceptance_criteria: System can exchange data seamlessly with external systems via APIs or standard protocols.
priority_justification: Critical for interoperability and streamlining data exchange processes.

description: Provide flexibility to customize claim processing workflows based on organizational needs.
acceptance_criteria: Administrators can define and configure workflows to suit specific business requirements.
priority_justification: Important for adapting to changing business processes and optimizing efficiency.

description: Manage and store documents associated with claims securely.
acceptance_criteria: System provides secure storage and retrieval of documents linked to claims.
priority_justification: Important for maintaining documentation integrity and supporting auditability.

description: Monitor and log user activities within the system for security and compliance purposes.
acceptance_criteria: System logs all user interactions and system events for auditing and compliance purposes.
priority_justification: Critical for detecting unauthorized access and ensuring compliance with regulations.

description: Manage provider networks and contracts for claims processing.
acceptance_criteria: System allows administrators to maintain provider networks and contracts.
priority_justification: Critical for ensuring accurate provider information and contract compliance.
